snippet.title: RP7 Release Trailer | EA Launch on September 12
snippet.description:
RP7 is a slot-managing roguelike game. Instead of directly controlling a character, players indirectly guide their character by spinning seven slots on the screen, which dictate their future movement path. Fight against various monsters to collect gold, and use the gold you gather to open item chests. Upgrade your items to become stronger. Beat the bosses and find your lost pet frog in this deep, dark dungeon!

Try free demo, and add your wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1334500/RP7/

Join our Discord server
https://discord.gg/3SZvMCXbuz
